segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirīmā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
